content.p: Department of Sport Everyone at Nottingham has the chance to participate in sport, at a level thatâ€™s right for them. There are sports centres on all of our campuses, and University Park Campus features the impressive David Ross Sports Village with 200-station fitness suite, swimming pool and climbing wall. The city of Nottingham is home to a wide range of sports facilities and clubs. Sport in Nottingham How to apply Fees and funding
